org.timepedia.chronoscope.client.browser
Class BrowserCanvas

java.lang.Object
  org.timepedia.chronoscope.client.canvas.Canvas
      org.timepedia.chronoscope.client.browser.BrowserCanvas

public class BrowserCanvas
extends Canvas

An implementation of Canvas that creates a CANVAS tag per Layer, as well as using DIVs and images to render text on the CANVAS

attach

public void attach(View view,
                   CanvasReadyCallback canvasReadyCallback)
Description copied from class: Canvas
Attach the layer to the UI tree and invoke callback if and only if it is ready for rendering operations. This is vitally important for plugin-based canvas implementations like Flash, Silverlight, and Applets where invoking native calls on unready plugins has caused browser crashes in our experience.

Overrides:
attach in class Canvas
